statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 70
SELECT location, timestamp FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data
SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT location, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT humidity, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 70
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE capacity >= 1000 AND storage_location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY energy_id;
SELECT energy_id, storage_location FROM energy_storage WHERE energy_type = 'Solar' AND capacity > 500 ORDER BY storage_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT storage_id, charge_status FROM energy_storage WHERE charge_status = TRUE;
SELECT timestamp, SUM(usage) AS total_usage FROM energy_usage GROUP BY timestamp ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC, humidity DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT timestamp, ROUND(usage, 2) AS rounded_usage FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE charge_status = TRUE ORDER BY capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT storage_id, SUM(usage) AS total_usage FROM energy_usage GROUP BY storage_id HAVING total_usage > 1000 ORDER BY total_usage DESC;
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE city='New York';
SELECT city, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, population FROM CityDetails ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT storage_id, capacity FROM EnergyStorage WHERE current_level < capacity * 0.2;
SELECT city_name, country, population FROM CityDetails WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE city = 'New York' AND wind_speed < 10 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT city_name, country, population FROM CityDetails WHERE population > 1000000 ORDER BY country, population DESC;
SELECT city, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherForecast WHERE date = '2023-07-15' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT city, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData wd JOIN WeatherForecast wf ON wd.city = wf.city WHERE wf.temperature > wd.temperature ORDER BY wd.temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_stations;
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM weather_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT station_name, timestamp, temperature FROM weather_readings WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, capacity, status FROM energy_storage WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT station_name, latitude, longitude FROM weather_stations ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT station_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM weather_readings GROUP BY station_id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption JOIN weather_stations ON energy_consumption.station_id = weather_stations.station_id WHERE location = 'New York' AND amount > 100;

SELECT station_name, SUM(amount) AS total_production FROM energy_production JOIN weather_stations ON energy_production.station_id = weather_stations.station_id GROUP BY station_name ORDER BY total_production DESC;
